RHighlight.p: Happy kids make happy parents and we loved the fact that the kids can continually entertain themselves in the games room and on the badminton court while the adults can relax well away in the social hub of the villa. The multi-level swimming pool is a great feature enhanced by a fantastic diving platform cleverly disguised as a viewing tower.

RSurroundArea.p: The villa is located in a residential neighbourhood dotted with local houses, resorts and villas. While the villa is not within walking distance of the main Seminyak scene, it only takes a few minutes to reach this area by car. The beach is within walking distance and is great for bracing walks and for surfing but not really suitable for swimming because of the strong currents.

ROverallComments.p: Of all the villas we’ve reviewed in Bali, Villa Asta is tops for families and kids. Never have we seen a villa so well set up for children’s entertainment, and with separate zones so that the adults (and kids) can escape from one another. It is no surprise that it's often booked for months in advance and guests return each year. The Guy Morgan-designed villa is full of common sense but without skimping on the luxury. In the three-bedroom pavilion, many guests will appreciate the flexibility of the bed configurations. Do note that whilst we rave about Villa Asta for families – these bedrooms are excellent for adults too, so the villa would work well for groups. The private plunge pools beside the master bedrooms’ pavilion are a gorgeous plus. Overall we found the villa to be a very bubbly and happy place, from the excellent staff who served us a wonderful barbecue during our inspection, down to the super friendly (and very fat!) koi fish, which are a great source of entertainment and fun to feed. What is also special about Villa Asta is the lovely stonework and thatch, which left us in no doubt that we were in Bali. When we revisited the property recently, we found that it has been immaculately maintained, with some new upholstered furnishings, a new marble floor, and upgraded facilities such as flat-screen TVs, computer and printer for guest use, and the addition of four bicycles.

RUnpleasantSurprise.p: Towering above the swimming pool is a double storey, four-metre high, ‘bale’ relaxation pavilion, affording glorious views of the neighbouring rice fields. We had great fun jumping off it into the swimming pool. The water is deep enough to do this, but children will need to be watched. The bridge over the plunge pool into the two-bedroom master pavilion may be a little bit challenging for seniors.

REVIEW.Name: Henry Stokeld
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Quite simply Villa Asta is amazing. Best decision ever to book it and a wonderful week. Thoroughly recommended.

REVIEW.Name: Stephen Canfora
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Asta villa was amazing 2nd time that I have stayed there and will highly recommend it to alot of people traveling in a group or with a big family.the Staff are the ones that make it 10/10 accommodation... love it

REVIEW.Name: Katherine Keenan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Such a wonderful experience! Everything was Perfect- from the outdoor bathrooms to the outstanding food. Very special mention to Rai and his exceptional team. So professional and accommodating. We had two little children with us (3year old and a 1 year old), and they were so wonderful with them. The villa was beautifully suited to children. Finally- the special birthday dinner banquet was so impressive and touching! More than we ever expected. Thank you so much! We can't wait to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Andrew Mackenzie
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Asta for our 10th wedding anniversary. The villa staff made our stay fantastic, they cooked an amazing bbq for us and our guests. Can definitely Villa Asta for a relaxing holiday.

REVIEW.Name: Yianni Prouzos
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Arrived at 12am at Villa and first impression was excellent. The staff on arrival were fantastic with accommodating our needs with the kids. During our stay staff were fantastic and always very helpful and could not fault the service. our group comprised of 6 adults and 5 kids all under the age of 5, and space was plenty.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Cole Cole
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Sensational 8 nights at Villa Asta. We went there for a friends 50th birthday celebration and the staff went the extra mile with special table decorations, balloons, rose petals on the bed which said happy birthday and also in the bathtub. We could not fault the Villa or the fantastic staff - thankyou to Rai and all the team. The food was of the highest quality and they are also great bartenders! The staff noticed from the passport dates that there was also another birthday during our stay and surprised us with a centre piece of birds made out of carrots and turnips including a Happy Birthday made out of the carrots & turnips. Our driver Yayan was terrific - nothing was too much trouble... on one particularly hot afternoon after trekking the shops for hours he greeted us half way down the street from the Van with bottles of cold water. No need to walk that extra 100 metres for a cold drink!

REVIEW.Name: Nick Mullins
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Pure bliss from the moment we walked through those amazing doors. The villa is perfect for families like mine (young kids, adults and grandparents) Rai and his staff provided top class service and made us feel very welcome from the moment we arrived. A special mention to Wayan the ever dependable driver who was always there when we needed him and always with a smile.

REVIEW.Name: Chris Thomas
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Stayed at Villa Asta with a group of friends for 7days. It was just as pictured on their website, beautiful. The staff was amazing and very accommodating. They cooked a dinner and 2 bbq lunches which were amazing. Even obliged our dietary restrictions and allowed us to order things off of their menu. The entire villa was clean and very cozy. Location was close to Seminyak shops and restaurants. About 40mins away from Nusa Dua and an hr from Ubud. Overall Villa Asta was beautiful and staff was wonderful. A special thanks to Rai, Yeni (so sweet and cute), Tato, Wyan (our driver) and the rest of the staff at Villa Asta. You rock!

REVIEW.Name: CHARLIE WINKWORTH-SMITH
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa was really good. We were staying in Villa Asta with our family for a week and had a blast. What made our trip was the staff, they were exceptional so helpful and friendly. We definitely want to stay at Villa Asta the next time we revisit Bali.

REVIEW.Name: Rene Kesler
REVIEW.ROverallComments: This was our second stay at Villa Asta, this year including a wedding celebration. The villa is a wonderful sanctuary, the staff is fabulous!

REVIEW.Name: Aaron Day
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is perfect for a large group looking to enjoy the pool and activity areas.

REVIEW.Name: Leah Cozens
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta staff for making my son and daughter in laws wedding sensational, we had a wonderful time and would certainly love to come back.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property Bali Villas Luxurious / Sari Property
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Asta for my husband’s 40th Birthday in 2014 and loved it so much that we returned this year with friends so we were 6 adults and 6 children! We stayed for 12 nights and it just went so fast. The villa was very clean, well maintained and we were so pleased to see all the staff from two years ago still at the villa especially the manager Rai who looked after us all and no request was ever a problem and was always attended to promptly. The food prepared by the villa was always fresh and exactly what we ordered. There was always more than enough food at breakfast which we ordered the night before. We organized a Seafood BBQ for Good Friday and invited some friends to come to the villa – 14 adults and 11 kids in total. The amazing food that was prepared as well as the attention to detail for the table setting and gorgeous individualized place settings – our guests were in awe of where we were staying! The Diving tower, billiard table, ping pong table, soccer pitch out the back - fabulous.

REVIEW.Name: Adam Atkinson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta! To all the amazing staff at Villa Asta. Thank you so much for making our holiday so relaxing, enjoyable, happy, amazing & memorable. We will do our best to start planning another visit. Such an unforgettable holiday. Best wishes – see you soon.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Yeo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Had a wonderful stay - villa staff went out of their way to make sure we were well taken care of !

REVIEW.Name: James Williams
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Rai and his staff made everything beyond our expectations! The villa was great, but the staff will be remembered for the trip.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for an amazing time at Villa Asta! We enjoyed the super service, the excellent food, the atmosphere and everything!

REVIEW.Name: Robert Bamford
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The villa is stunning, comfortable and providing everything. Thank you for all you hospitality and excellent service, we had an amazing time.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Rodeigueza
REVIEW.ROverallComments: I love Villa Asta! It's home away from home. The service is superb and excellent! Will definitely recommend to my friends and will definitely come back.

REVIEW.Name: Emma Bini
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A huge thank you to the amazing staff here, absolutely fantastic! We had the wonderful time. This place is a slice of heaven!

REVIEW.Name: Richards Scott
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Great Villa with a fantastic pool .. we had a couple of fantastic BBQ's there, with additional guests and staff were excellent as was the food. Could not fault the place really. Hope you enjoy your stay as much as we did !

REVIEW.Name: Joel Nupier
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Best place I have ever stayed ! Thank you for the hospitality, you guys are legends.

REVIEW.Name: PURI ASIA ASIA
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A special thank you to Rai, Yeni and Tato. Hadi & I came with our uncle, auntie and family for vacation, coincidentally it's our 2nd anniversary. We have been showered with nothing but warmth, hospitality, dedications, megawatt smiles, and really exceptional treatment. Villa Asta will always be in our heart.

REVIEW.Name: Jan Fallon
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta. Especially to Rai, Yeni and all the staff for making our stay relaxing and special. Nothing was too much trouble - we couldn't fault anything. Thank you again.

REVIEW.Name: GEORGIE ABAY
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A truly wonderful family holiday in the beautiful Villa Asta, thank you all for looking us so handsomely and tolerating our children. We leave with sorrowfully but with loads of happy memories (to sustain us in the London drizzle). Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Anirudh Parekh
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta for helping us to create a memorable family vacation.

REVIEW.Name: Anne Lepissier
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta and all the fantastic team lead by Rai for this perfect family gathering in Bali! Our family lives apart between Europe and Asia and this was a fantastic opportunity to connect all together, it was amazing!! Thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Yuli Sandra
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We stayed at Villa Asta just 1 night during our business trip, but it was a very enjoyable and most pleasant stay. It is like a small paradise near Seminyak centre. Very friendly and professional staff - we were given a warm welcome. Food was also very good - could pre-order tasty breakfast (different options to choose from!). The villa is very beautiful, with a big pool and lovely garden. Rooms were spacious, very clean. There is a mini-market just around the corner, some shops and restaurants nearby. Very suitable for those who prefer peaceful location. Seminyak centre is close - only some 10 minutes by taxi (and taxi fare only 2-3 EUR). We can definitely recommend this villa!

REVIEW.Name: Heidi Caudle
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Asta! The most amazing place in the world. thank you to the fantastic staff who made Spiro and Paul's 50th birthday so memorable. Nothing to fault, absolute perfection!!! We cannot wait to return.

REVIEW.Name: Su Yee Chan
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta for providing us with a wonderful stay! Excellent staff - friendly and accommodating. Thank you for making our Mum's birthday dinner so beautiful and special!

REVIEW.Name: Peter Bishop
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the amazing staff of Villa Asta for making our holiday & 40th birthday party the best holiday we have ever had. Villa Asta is truely a hidden gem of Bali, may the future bring you good fortune and happiness.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thanks to all the Villa Asta staff for making the 'Molloy' family holiday a very memorable one. it was very hectic with 6 infants but you all made it seem effortless! The food, cleanliness, the friendly staff and the villa made our stay a pleasant one.

REVIEW.Name: Lynette Teo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to the staff at Villa Asta. With the baby, young kids and birthday party, you did an excellent job managing it all and giving us a wonderful family holiday. The staff were excellent, taking initiative and going out of the way to give us a great stay. Thanks again, we hope to be back one day.

REVIEW.Name: Nikhilesh Pawar
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the excellent staff at Villa Asta for making our stay here so comfortable and memorable, we have all enjoyed our stay at this beautiful property and will cherish the wonderful memories....

REVIEW.Name: Onefine stay/Travel Keys Onefine stay/Travel Keys
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for the most amazing week at Villa Asta! The staff is so friendly and helpful and the Chef (Eka) kept giving us the most amazing food. We can't wait to come back!

REVIEW.Name: Villa Gallery Bali / Mas Tour & Travel
REVIEW.ROverallComments: It's a beautiful place to stay and the staff here is so nice and they kept the place so well. The family's very first company conference is hold here and there 12 people altogether. A big group usually not easy to arrange food, drinks and it's a big villa so requires a lot of effort. Yet the staff keep everything so organised, clean and made awesome food. We're so amazed and definitely would come back. Thanks to all of you, we had a successful meeting and look forward to further development of the company. Many many thanks and may the Buddha bless you!

REVIEW.Name: Angela Chittenden
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We love the staff at Villa Asta! Thank you Rai, Tato, Yeni, Topan, Didik and everyone else - you are amazing. Stoked to be back for a second time, this place is like heaven.

REVIEW.Name: Nomad The Luxe agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Rai and team - you guys have been excellent hosts and our 4 families had a lovely time here. Food was great, fish grew fatter, kids were never bored and everyone had fun.

REVIEW.Name: Karyn Page
REVIEW.ROverallComments: We have just returned from an 11 night stay at this fantastic Villa. We were there for my husbands 60th birthday celebrations and I had booked it for family and a few very close friends. Everything was absolutely fantastic. Rai and the team at the villa were always willing to go above and beyond with no request ever too much trouble or too difficult. The grounds and pool are beautiful with just a perfect setup for a group like ours. Guest rooms also have everything you could possibly need. We definitely hope to make it back again. Absolutely could not fault this wonderful villa.

REVIEW.Name: Richard Riddell
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Amazing 10 days at Villa Asta, beautiful surroundings and just wonderful staff. We loved celebrating Scotty's 60th birthday with great friends who have been wonderful company.

REVIEW.Name: Hampton Travel & Cruise Hampton Travel & Cruise
REVIEW.ROverallComments: What a wonderful stay at Villa Asta!!! A huge thanks to Rai and the team for making our trip so special.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Je t'aime
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Merci pour c'est 2 semaines magique le staff it's perfect. Des jolies moments passe dans cette maison, des souvenirs plein la tete avec tout nos amis. Merci beaucoups

REVIEW.Name: Annika Harr
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a fantastic time here in Villa Asta.

REVIEW.Name: Sunir Raja
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa Asta differentiates itself from all the wonderful villas in Bali by its truly exceptional staff and Villa Manager Rai, you are truly exceptional.

REVIEW.Name: Lee Zielinski
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Villa with service superb, food and ambiance. Fantastic table setting, garden, pool area amazing. Detail to perfection.

REVIEW.Name: Suzanne Rayner
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for a phenomenal stay here at Villa Asta! a beautiful setting for a global family reunion.Service and accommodation were 5 stars all the way, thank you.

REVIEW.Name: Of Villas Ministry
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Rai and your excellent team for a luxurious and refreshing stay.

REVIEW.Name: Margaret Williamson
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for all the great memories and fun! We loved the Babi Guling and all the special table settings and incredible service, what a beautiful holiday. A real paradise! The smiles from the staff just keep coming, the garden is inspirational, the food exceptional, the pool is glorious. Will recommend to my mates in Australia. Thank you

REVIEW.Name: Patrick Loll
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you to all the staff at Villa Asta for making our family holiday so special, the villa is beautiful, the pool, garden, setting - so much to do in this paradise away from the hustle and bustle. Completely relaxing thank you so much!

REVIEW.Name: Cecile Ducreux
REVIEW.ROverallComments: A big thank you to the whole team at Villa Asta. Superb service, beautiful peaceful villa, garden and service. Rai - your table decoration setting will be missed. All of your smiles and friendly faces will be missed too. Terimakasih! Suksma!

REVIEW.Name: Holiday Villa Rental Bali Villa Escapes
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Will definitely be back! One of the most memorable holiday we've ever had! The staff were incredible and the villa is a piece of paradise and has an aura that makes you never want to leave, everything was absolutely amazing, thank so much to Villa Asta team.

REVIEW.Name: total bali Total Bali agent
REVIEW.ROverallComments: The staff, the ambiance and the energy here is beyond amazing, this place has exceed all expectations. We will be coming back, thank you to Rai for all your hard work, BBQ dinner is a must!

REVIEW.Name: Harley Browne
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much for the hospitality - from the moment we arrived we loved every second. Thank you so much for making us feel at home, we will definitely be back.

REVIEW.Name: Luke Mansfield
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Once again you have been wonderful, thanks Rai and the team for a great holiday of course we will be back very soon.

REVIEW.Name: / L. V Fantasia Limited Fantasia Villa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Loved, Loved, Loved my stay here! Rai, Kadek and Dididk were awesome. Thank you so much for the warmth, friendliness and service, you are the best.

REVIEW.Name: Rio Winardi
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you Villa Asta for making our stay a most pleasant one! Your staff and service are simply fantastic and we love your hospitality. Great environment for a retreat, well done.

REVIEW.Name: Colette Fox
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Rai, Yeni, Topan and the rest of the wonderful staff (particularly the very smiley gardener) - thank you all for a very magical stay and one that will be fondly remembered by all our family and friends.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you so much to all Villa Asta staff, Rai was 'the man' always with a quick and helpful solution. Great villa, great service, we will for sure recommend to friends and maybe one day return.

REVIEW.Name: Michelle Yeo
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Unforgettable experience at this villa, thank you very much for great services - you are amazing, we will be back.

REVIEW.Name: Anne Naylor
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To Rai and all the wonderful staff at Villa Asta, thank you all for the wonderful service and attention you have given us during our week long stay, it has been a great chance for us to have a family holiday in wonderful warm Bali. The Finn's recreation passes have been well used and very much appreciated especially by the AFL Melbourne supporters who enjoyed watching their team play a final. We hope to see you again one day.

REVIEW.Name: Schreier Marisa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for recommending Villa Asta. Our family had the BEST time imaginable. From the moment we arrived we felt like we were in paradise. The standard of cleanliness, the facilities, cooking and entire staff were amazing. Nothing was ever a problem for the staff. We were disappointed to leave. It will be hard to top Villa Asta! In fact, I don't think it is possible!! We look forward to returning.

REVIEW.Name: April Walker
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the amazing Villa Asta crew, thank you for making our experience so memorable. You are an asset to Villa Asta, you have left a lasting impression.

REVIEW.Name: Bali Luxury Villas - BLV Bali Luxury Villas - BLV
REVIEW.ROverallComments: To the wonderful staff at Villa Asta, we had an amazing family holiday. I have enjoyed your spectacular hospitality. Thank you so much for looking after us.

REVIEW.Name: Miqdhaadh Moosa
REVIEW.ROverallComments: Thank you for making our first trip to Bali a wonderful experience. We felt at home right from the moment we arrived. You guys are awesome. Thank you for my surprise birthday celebration and without your help I'm sure it wouldn't have been a great one. Hopefully we will come back to visit.
